cpci_add_regions_description: OVH offers several solutions for creating infrastructures, or a container. You have access to a selection of regions by default, but you can choose to add new regions.
cpci_add_regions_add_region_success: The region {{ code }} is being activated â€” this may take up to 60 minutes. You will be notified by email once the region is available.
cpci_add_regions_info_message: Adding new regions may take up to a few minutes. Once the regions have been added, you can add servers or containers to them.
